channel.title: MBallSectionsDR
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MBallSectionsDR, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: The Hitchhiker's Guide to how Congress may try to discipline judges who rule against Trump
item.description: Multiple federal judges have attempted to stop President Donald Trump's actions, while House Republicans race to push Trump's agenda through Congress.

item.title: EXCLUSIVE: GOP moves to authorize Trump to wage war on cartels through military force
item.description: Rep. Greg Steube is introducing a resolution to empower the Trump administration to “take a sledgehammer" to the cartels by authorizing the use of the...

item.title: The World Health Organization Is Covering for Hamas
item.description: The agency has consistently concealed Hamas’s abuses and misrepresented Israel’s counterterrorism efforts.

item.title: The End of My Planned Parenthood
item.description: The closure of an abortion clinic comes as good, long-prayed-for news, and it is reality now.

item.title: Federal judge rules DOGE broke privacy rules in accessing Education Department files
item.description: A federal judge in Maryland issued an injunction Monday against President Trump's Department of Government Efficiency, ruling that it trampled on priv...

item.title: Democrats Have A Manhood Problem, In More Ways Than One
item.description: Almost no one believes the absurd tenets of transgender ideology. They pretend to believe because everyone around them is also pretending to believe.

item.title: Trump Cracks Down On ‘Grossly Unethical’ Lawfare Obstructing His Second Term Agenda
item.description: No more will lawyers and law firms be able to impede Trump’s every move with court actions, without risking consequences.

item.title: Stacey Abrams-founded nonprofit faces crackdown threat from House GOP's top tax writer
item.description: A top House Republican chairman wants the IRS to revoke the tax-exempt status from a group founded by Stacey Abrams.

item.title: Anti-Tesla Terrorism
item.description: There is no excuse for the violence, but it is revealing about the Left.

item.title: Trump slams actor George Clooney in rant against media, judges and a portrait artist

item.title: Former Rep. Mia Love, the first Black Republican woman elected to Congress, dies
item.description: Former U.S. Rep. Mia Love of Utah, a daughter of Haitian immigrants who became the first Black Republican woman elected to Congress, died Sunday.

item.title: Greenland's leader slams 'very aggressive' U.S. stance before delegation visit
item.description: Greenland's leader says the U.S. is being "very aggressive" ahead of a visit by U.S. second lady Usha Vance and appealed to the international communit...

item.title: Five Years Of Lockdown Trauma Reinforces Skepticism Of ‘The Scientific Consensus’
item.description: The scientific community, when it takes up the next cause, should recognize that it is no small thing to infringe on personal autonomy.

item.title: Gavin Newsom Embodies The Left’s Sinister Ideology That Destroyed California
item.description: Newsom’s idea of problem-solving is to trot out the progressive platitudes and boring bromides of the Left Coast elite.

item.title: SCOOP: House to hold hearings next week on 'activist judges' blocking Trump agenda
item.description: Fox News Digital is told the House Judiciary Committee is holding a hearing on activist judges next week.

item.title: Voter ID Alone Won’t Make Pennsylvania’s Elections Trustworthy
item.description: While requiring voters to prove they are who they say they are does make elections more secure, the reality tends to be more complicated.

item.title: Trump faces most nationwide injunctions in recent history

item.title: Snow White Is a Box Office Dwarf
item.description: Will Hollywood once again fail to learn from its mistakes?

item.title: The President Can Act Unilaterally to Defend America Abroad
item.description: The Trump administration’s actions against the Houthis are legally grounded in the U.S. Constitution and fully permissible under international law.
